    How to migrate to Quire? Copy and paste.
    POSTED BY Crystal Chen · Oct 27, 2016
    Many of you have asked about a way to import your work from a different app into Quire, without going through the trouble of entering them one by one. Now, we have the answer: Copy and paste. Be it an Excel sheet with data, a Word document of bullet list, or an email from your coworker, you can easily move them to Quire and continue where you left off... continue reading
